AddResolverEndpoint.title: AddResolverEndpoint
AddResolverEndpoint.summary: You can call this operation to add an endpoint.

AddResolverRule.title: AddResolverRule
AddResolverRule.summary: The AddResolverRule operation adds a forwarding rule.

AddUserVpcAuthorization.title: AddUserVpcAuthorization
AddUserVpcAuthorization.summary: Grants cross-account authorization for a VPC.

AddZone.title: AddZone
AddZone.summary: Call the AddZone operation to create a built-in authoritative zone. The built-in authoritative zone can be a standard zone or an accelerated zone.

AddZoneRecord.title: AddZoneRecord
AddZoneRecord.summary: Call the AddZoneRecord operation to add a DNS record to an authoritative zone. Within the effective scope of the zone, the internal DNS record for a domain name overwrites its public DNS record.

BindResolverRuleVpc.title: BindResolverRuleVpc
BindResolverRuleVpc.summary: The BindResolverRuleVpc operation associates a forwarding rule with a virtual private cloud (VPC).

BindZoneVpc.title: BindZoneVpc
BindZoneVpc.summary: Binds a zone to or unbinds a zone from one or more VPCs. This operation defines the scope in which the zone is effective.

ChangeZoneDnsGroup.title: ChangeZoneDnsGroup
ChangeZoneDnsGroup.summary: Modify the location of a ZONE.

CheckZoneName.title: CheckZoneName
CheckZoneName.summary: You can call the CheckZoneName operation to check whether a zone name is available.

DeleteResolverEndpoint.title: DeleteResolverEndpoint
DeleteResolverEndpoint.summary: You can call the DeleteResolverEndpoint operation to delete an endpoint by its ID.

DeleteResolverRule.title: DeleteResolverRule
DeleteResolverRule.summary: Deletes a forwarding rule by its ID.

DeleteUserVpcAuthorization.title: DeleteUserVpcAuthorization
DeleteUserVpcAuthorization.summary: Deletes a cross-account authorization based on a specified account ID and authorization type.

DeleteZone.title: DeleteZone
DeleteZone.summary: Deletes an idle zone (built-in authoritative domain name).

DeleteZoneRecord.title: DeleteZoneRecord
DeleteZoneRecord.summary: The DeleteZoneRecord operation deletes a DNS record by its ID.

DescribeChangeLogs.title: DescribeChangeLogs
DescribeChangeLogs.summary: You can call the DescribeChangeLogs operation to retrieve the operation logs for a private zone. The logs record operations related to built-in authoritative zones, cache management, forwarding management, endpoints, and DNS record queries. You can perform a fuzzy search by keywords such as behavior and content.

DescribeCustomLineInfo.title: DescribeCustomLineInfo
DescribeCustomLineInfo.summary: You can call this operation to query the details of a custom line.

DescribeCustomLines.title: DescribeCustomLines
DescribeCustomLines.summary: Queries a list of custom lines.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Call the DescribeRegions operation to query a list of available regions. You can filter the list by criteria such as the scenario and VPC type.

DescribeRequestGraph.title: DescribeRequestGraph
DescribeRequestGraph.summary: Queries details about the number of requests based on conditions such as a time range.

DescribeResolverAvailableZones.title: DescribeResolverAvailableZones
DescribeResolverAvailableZones.summary: Call DescribeResolverAvailableZones to retrieve a list of available zones.

DescribeResolverEndpoint.title: DescribeResolverEndpoint
DescribeResolverEndpoint.summary: You can call DescribeResolverEndpoint to retrieve the details of an endpoint by its ID.

DescribeResolverEndpoints.title: DescribeResolverEndpoints
DescribeResolverEndpoints.summary: You can call DescribeResolverEndpoints to retrieve a list of endpoints.

DescribeResolverRule.title: DescribeResolverRule
DescribeResolverRule.summary: Call the DescribeResolverRule operation to retrieve the details of a forwarding rule.

DescribeResolverRules.title: DescribeResolverRules
DescribeResolverRules.summary: Describes one or more forwarding rules.

DescribeStatisticSummary.title: DescribeStatisticSummary
DescribeStatisticSummary.summary: Call the DescribeStatisticSummary operation to retrieve a summary of yesterday's request volume. This summary includes the top three zones and top three VPCs ranked by request volume.

DescribeSyncEcsHostTask.title: DescribeSyncEcsHostTask
DescribeSyncEcsHostTask.summary: Call DescribeSyncEcsHostTask to retrieve the details of a hostname sync task based on a zone ID.

DescribeTags.title: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resources in PrivateZone.

DescribeUserServiceStatus.title: DescribeUserServiceStatus
DescribeUserServiceStatus.summary: Queries the service status of the current user, which indicates whether the service is activated or has overdue payments.

DescribeUserVpcAuthorizations.title: DescribeUserVpcAuthorizations
DescribeUserVpcAuthorizations.summary: Call the DescribeUserVpcAuthorizations operation to retrieve a list of cross-account authorizations.

DescribeZoneInfo.title: DescribeZoneInfo
DescribeZoneInfo.summary: Call the DescribeZoneInfo operation to retrieve the details of a specified built-in authoritative zone. The details include the list of VPCs that are bound to the zone.

DescribeZoneRecord.title: DescribeZoneRecord
DescribeZoneRecord.summary: Queries the details of a DNS record.

DescribeZoneRecords.title: DescribeZoneRecords
DescribeZoneRecords.summary: You can call DescribeZoneRecords to query DNS records for a zone.

DescribeZoneVpcTree.title: DescribeZoneVpcTree
DescribeZoneVpcTree.summary: Call the DescribeZoneVpcTree operation to query the zones and the Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs) attached to them in your account.

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: You can call the DescribeZones operation to query a list of zones available to your account.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resources in Private Zone.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: You can call the MoveResourceGroup operation to move a resource to a different resource group.

SearchCustomLines.title: SearchCustomLines
SearchCustomLines.summary: Searches for custom access control lists (ACLs).

SetProxyPattern.title: SetProxyPattern
SetProxyPattern.summary: Sets the recursive resolution proxy for subdomains.

SetZoneRecordStatus.title: SetZoneRecordStatus
SetZoneRecordStatus.summary: You can call SetZoneRecordStatus to set the status of a DNS record for a zone. This enables or pauses DNS resolution.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: You can call the TagResources operation to add or modify tags for one or more zones in a batch.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: You can call the UntagResources operation to remove tags from one or more zones in PrivateZone.

UpdateRecordRemark.title: UpdateRecordRemark
UpdateRecordRemark.summary: You can call the UpdateRecordRemark operation to modify the remarks of a DNS record based on its ID.

UpdateSyncEcsHostTask.title: UpdateSyncEcsHostTask
UpdateSyncEcsHostTask.summary: Call the UpdateSyncEcsHostTask operation to add or update a hostname sync task.

UpdateZoneRecord.title: UpdateZoneRecord
UpdateZoneRecord.summary: The UpdateZoneRecord operation modifies a DNS record for a zone. You can change properties such as the host record, record type, and weight.

UpdateZoneRemark.title: UpdateZoneRemark
UpdateZoneRemark.summary: Modifies the remark for a built-in authoritative domain name (zone).
